# GPS.Components.Cryptography

.NET Library for signature Xades-BES (SHA-1, SHA-256 Enveloped, Enveloping) and PKCS#7.

.NET Framework 4.0: Download GPS.Components.Cryptography.dll: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1L91TkunVJLoA5IE-ExHMWeRWvncYhQFD/view?usp=sharing
.NET Standard 2.0: https://www.nuget.org/packages/Xades.Components

## Methods

The **XadesDocument** in the namespace of GPS.Components.Cryptography.Xades:

```
Constructor parameters: 
@CryptType - SHA1, SHA256 (enum)
@EnvelopeType - Enveloped, Enveloping (enum)

public static XmlDocument SignXades(XmlDocument doc, X509Certificate2 cert)

public static XmlDocument SignXades(string base64String, X509Certificate2 cert, string fileToSignName = "")

public static byte[] SignXades(XmlDocument doc, X509Certificate2 cert, ref XmlDocument signedXml)

public static byte[] SignXadesBase64File(string base64String, X509Certificate2 cert, ref XmlDocument signedXml, string fileToSignName = "")

```

The **Pkcs7Document** in the namespace of GPS.Components.Cryptography.Pkcs7:

``` 

public static byte[] GetByte(object obj)

public static byte[] GetByte64(object obj)

public static byte[] GetByte64(object obj, ref string xml)

public static byte[] GetByte64(byte[] byteArray)
```

The **X509Certificate2Provider** in the namespace of GPS.Components.Cryptography:

```
public static X509Certificate2 SelectCertificate (string title, string description)        
    
public static X509Certificate2 GetCertificate(object findValue, X509FindType findType)
```

The **ByteProvider** in the namespace of GPS.Components.Cryptography:

``` 
public static byte[] GetByte(object obj)

public static byte[] GetByte64(object obj)

public static byte[] GetByte64(object obj, ref string xml)

public static byte[] GetByte64(byte[] byteArray)
```

## Examples

```
X509Certificate certificate = EDeklaracja.GetCertificate("A600C49442FD00B77894F83E5CD0C37FA48FC45D", X509FindType.FindByThumbprint);
XmlDocument doc = XmlDocument.Load(@"c:\file.xml");
XmlDocument signed = new XmlDocument();

XadesDocument xades = new XadesDocument(CryptType.SHA256, EnvelopeType.Enveloped);

1) XmlDocument signedXml = xades.SignXades(doc, certificate);

2) XmlDocument signedXml = xades.SignXades(doc.OuterXml, certificate);

3) byte[] byte = xades.SignXades(doc, certificate, ref signed);

4) byte[] byte = xades.SignXadesBase64File("", certificate, CryptType.SHA256, ref signed);
```
## Example object with Signature

The signature (SHA-256 Enveloped) is compatible for the "e-deklaracje" system in Poland

```
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><Signature Id="Signature-265e4f81-bdf4-402d-9753-fb977edba826" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/09/xmldsig#"><SignedInfo Id="SignedInfo-265e4f81-bdf4-402d-9753-fb977edba826"><CanonicalizationMethod Algorithm="http://www.w3.org/TR/2001/REC-xml-c14n-20010315" /><SignatureMethod Algorithm="http://www.w3.org/2001/04/xmldsig-more#rsa-sha256" /><Reference Id="Signature-265e4f81-bdf4-402d-9753-fb977edba826-KeyInfo-Ref" URI="#Object_265e4f81-bdf4-402d-9753-fb977edba82"><DigestMethod Algorithm="http://www.w3.org/2001/04/xmlenc#sha256" /><DigestValue>d7mXqSZZj5lQ3plQYBnriqUfNrMsAK+cD8F32EQcDjI=</DigestValue></Reference></SignedInfo><SignatureValue>FaUe59CE6F0it4Hi6Af8WQoXyEhJSSS0ZcLbOMVaRfPO/2CFvV27vD99ExqPWCm4ZONwzuobIw4UbcFXlcV3JYuIRDf/0QfcNS0Tl/pR64ecRVdL7DEyIHpyXfVFKsOo+oTYJUamqu5288QJDSRqNyTuSY15zzSllfK4Sh0U7M0=</SignatureValue><KeyInfo http://www.test.com</X509IssuerName><X509SerialNumber>134316518768006064318111822423947528543</X509SerialNumber></xades:IssuerSerial></xades:Cert></xades:SigningCertificate></xades:SignedSignatureProperties><xades:SignedDataObjectProperties><xades:DataObjectFormat ObjectReference="#Signature-265e4f81-bdf4-402d-9753-fb977edba826-KeyInfo-Ref"><xades:Description>BINARY_FORMAT []</xades:Description><xades:MimeType>text/xml</xades:MimeType><xades:Encoding>http://www.w3.org/2000/09/xmldsig#base64</xades:Encoding></xades:DataObjectFormat></xades:SignedDataObjectProperties></xades:SignedProperties></xades:QualifyingProperties></Object><Object
```
